Today we we got into the nuts and bolts of how to build custom tags and components in AngularJS, data binding characters to be used with custom directives, and how to handle git merge conflicts. Additionally, I finally figured out how to handle salting a SHA1 hashed password and validating the user login and registration, subsequently returning a cookie to the logged in user!

Data Binding Characters

  • < one-way data binding
  • = two-way data binding
  • @ access a string value passed into a directive
